plist.dict:
CFBundleDevelopmentRegion $(DEVELOPMENT_LANGUAGE) CFBundleDisplayName OpenClaw CFBundleExecutable $(EXECUTABLE_NAME) CFBundleIconName AppIcon CFBundleIdentifier $(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER) CFBundleInfoDictionaryVersion 6.0 CFBundleName $(PRODUCT_NAME) CFBundlePackageType APPL CFBundleShortVersionString 2026.1.29 CFBundleVersion 20260129 NSAppTransportSecurity
NSAllowsArbitraryLoadsInWebContent
NSBonjourServices
_openclaw-gw._tcp
NSCameraUsageDescription OpenClaw can capture photos or short video clips when requested via the gateway. NSLocalNetworkUsageDescription <<<<<<< HEAD <<<<<<< HEAD <<<<<<< HEAD Clawdbot discovers and connects to your Clawdbot bridge on the local network. <<<<<<< HEAD ======= ======= Clawdbot discovers and connects to your Clawdbot gateway on the local network. >>>>>>> upstream/main ======= Moltbot discovers and connects to your Moltbot gateway on the local network. >>>>>>> upstream/main ======= OpenClaw discovers and connects to your OpenClaw gateway on the local network. >>>>>>> upstream/main NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescription OpenClaw can share your location in the background when you enable Always. NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription <<<<<<< HEAD <<<<<<< HEAD Clawdbot uses your location when you allow location sharing. >>>>>>> upstream/main ======= Moltbot uses your location when you allow location sharing. >>>>>>> upstream/main ======= OpenClaw uses your location when you allow location sharing. >>>>>>> upstream/main NSMicrophoneUsageDescription OpenClaw needs microphone access for voice wake. NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription OpenClaw uses on-device speech recognition for voice wake. UIApplicationSceneManifest
UIApplicationSupportsMultipleScenes
UIBackgroundModes
audio
UILaunchScreen
